room_title: Escape room "Professor Moriarty’s Gameroom" by The Great Escape Room in Detroit
review: My brother and I had a fantastic time! The puzzles were very clever in the Gameroom and it was a good brain exercise. It was also good teamwork experience with people I didn't know beforehand. Katie was a phenomenal game master. Highly recommend!

room_title: Escape room "Professor Moriarty’s Gameroom" by The Great Escape Room in Detroit
review: Had a great time with three generations of our family. Not as polished or high tech as some other competitors, but a really good time. Really makes you think and work with others. Enough going on that no one is left out. And we did escape!

room_title: Escape room "Professor Moriarty’s Gameroom" by The Great Escape Room in Detroit
review: We had 6 people in our room and escaped with 3 minutes to spare. It was really fun, not scary, but definitely engaging and would do it again. A little pricey for an hour's worth of fun so that's why we only gave it 4 out of 5 stars. They put a lot of work into the room and the puzzles were stimulating and kept everybody interested.

room_title: Escape room "Professor Moriarty’s Gameroom" by The Great Escape Room in Detroit
review: One word: FUN! We went with family members 8-75. The Great Escape is fun for everyone! Spoiler: Stay organized, start right away but don't panic and remember- one hour to solve a puzzle with a bunch of other people is a long time. Don't be disappointed if you don't get it, you can always try another room another day. Great way to spend your birthday or get to know a team! Fabulous! Like a live video game adventure to bring out the detective in you!
